data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Kilinochchi, Sri Lanka, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kilinochchi, Sri Lanka

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 11 believers in Kilinochchi, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: God, guide the 11 believers in Kilinochchi to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Kilinochchi
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Sonar (Hindu traditions) people might believe through him.
Father, help the 11 believers in Kilinochchi to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Kilinochchi, Sri Lanka will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Kilinochchi. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

location.name: Kilinochchi
location.people_groups_list: Bania, Sindhi (Muslim traditions), Paraiyan (Hindu traditions), Radayo, Sayyid
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bania (16,000), Sindhi (Muslim traditions) (1,000), Paraiyan (Hindu traditions) (102,000), Radayo (1,700), Sayyid (49,000)
